description: The pilot makes an entry call to the tower, reporting their position and altitude.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, we are crossing Z-2 maintaining 1500ft.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 1500ft, report field in sight Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Maintain 1500ft, call you field in sight Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot makes an entry call for an initial pitch out.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, over Z-2 at 1500 feet for initial pitch out.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 1500 feet, report field in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you field in sight Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot initiates a PFL overhead procedure with a radio check.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, radio check.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, loud and clear. Maintain 2000 feet, report field in sight Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Maintain 2000 feet, call you field in sight Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot makes an entry call for a VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, maintaining 3000 feet for VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 3000 feet, report B-1.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Maintain 3000 feet, call you B-1, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot is released from Dhaka Control and requests descent for a VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, released by DAC control, ready for descend.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descend to 3000 feet, {QNH 1013}, report over VOR, proceeding outbound of let down Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Descending to 3000 feet, {QNH 1013}, call you over VOR, proceeding outbound of let down Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot is released from Dhaka Control and requests descent for a VOR-Z approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, released by DAC Control, ready for descent.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descend to 3000 feet, {QNH 1013}, report established 12 DME Arc Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Descending to 3000 feet, {QNH 1013}, call you established 12 DME Arc Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot is released from Dhaka Control and requests descent for an RNP approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, released by DAC Control, ready for descent.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descend to 3000 feet, QNH 1013, report over JERIN.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Descending to 3000 feet, {QNH 1013}, call you over JERIN, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports that the airfield is in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, field in sight Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you initial Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the beginning of the initial approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report end of initial Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you end of initial Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the end of the initial approach and receives descent instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR} {Call Sign}, end of initial.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descent to 1000ft join beginning of downwind.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you downwind, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the field is in sight for the PFL procedure.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, field in sight Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report crossing undershoot Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you crossing undershoot Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports crossing the undershoot and receives further instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, crossing undershoot Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 2000 feet, report approaching high key.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Maintain 2000 feet, call you approaching high key, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports approaching the high key position.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, approaching high key.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report high key.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you report high key, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports at the high key position.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, high key.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report low key.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you low key, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports at the low key position.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, low key.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report base key.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you base key, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports at the base key position.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, base key.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, surface wind 320 at 05 knots, check gears down and locked, report final Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, gears are green, call you final Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a full stop landing during a PFL.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final, three green, for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, recheck gears down and locked, surface wind 320 at 05 knots, cleared to land Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Cleared to land Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the B-1 fix during a VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, B-1

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, maintain 3000 feet, report B-2.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you B-2, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the B-2 fix and approaching the outbound leg.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, B-2, approaching outbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report 6 miles out.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you 6 miles out, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports 6 miles out and receives approach clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, 6 miles out.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, cleared for the approach. report turning inbound.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you turning inbound, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning inbound on the VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, turning inbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report steady inbound.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you steady inbound, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports steady on the inbound course.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, steady inbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descend to minima, report runway in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Descending to minima, call you runway in sight, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the runway in sight and receives clearance for landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, runway in sight.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, surface wind 180 at 05 knots, cleared to land Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, clear to land Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the VOR and proceeding outbound for a civil VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, over VOR proceeding outbound of letdown.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, cleared for the approach, descend to 1700 feet, report turning inbound.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you turning inbound, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning inbound during a civil VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, turning inbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report established inbound.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you established inbound, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports established on the inbound course for a civil VOR-Y approach.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, established inbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, descend to your minima, report runway in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Descending to minima, call you runway in sight, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the runway in sight during a civil VOR-Y approach and is cleared to land.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, runway in sight.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, surface wind 280 at 05 knots, Rwy-16, cleared to land.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, clear to land Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports established on the 12 DME Arc.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, established 12 DME Arc.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, cleared for the approach. Descend to 1700 feet, report crossing radial 300.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you crossing radial 300, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports crossing the specified radial.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, crossing radial 300.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, report turning inbound Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you turning inbound Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning inbound and receives descent instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, turning inbound.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, descend to minima, report runway in sight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Descending to minima, call you runway in sight, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports the runway in sight and receives landing clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, runway in sight.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked, wind calm, Rwy-16, cleared to land.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, clear to land Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the JERIN waypoint.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, over JERIN.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, cleared for the approach. Descend to 1700 feet, report over JR161.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you over JR161, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the JR161 waypoint.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, over JR161.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, report over JR160.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you over JR160, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports over the JR160 waypoint and receives landing clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Call Sign}, over JR160.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked, wind calm, Rwy-16, cleared to land.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, clear to land Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: After landing, the tower provides taxi instructions to the pilot.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, {taxi via C} after vacating contact ground 121.8.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {Taxi via C}, after vacating contact ground 121.8, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot contacts ground control after landing for taxi instructions to the tarmac.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, back to your frequency.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, {taxi via C-P-A} to tarmac.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {taxi via C-P-A} to tarmac, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot, operating 5 miles west, requests to rejoin the circuit for landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, operating 5 miles west, request to join the circuit for landing.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report downwind Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you downwind Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The helicopter pilot reports on the downwind leg.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, downwind.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report final for R-P.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: call you final for R-P, {Call Sign}.

description: The helicopter pilot reports on final for R-P and receives landing clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for R-P.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, surface wind 180 at 05 knots, cleared to land at R-P.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: s/w copied, cleared to land, {Call Sign}.

description: After landing, the pilot requests dispersal and receives taxi instructions.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, request dispersal.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, air taxi via Q, contact ground when clear.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Air taxi via Q, will contact ground when clear, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot contacts ground for taxi instructions to the helipad.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, back to your frequency.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, air taxi via Q to the helipad.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.message: Q to helipad copied, {Call Sign}.
